price: Dan raja berkata, "Bawalah dia kepadaku." Ketika utusan itu datang kepadanya, dia (Yusuf) berkata, "Kembalilah kepada tuanmu dan tanyakan kepadanya bagaimana halnya perempuan-perempuan yang telah melukai tangannya. Sungguh, Tuhanku Maha Mengetahui tipu daya mereka."
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلۡمَلِكُ ٱئۡتُونِي بِهِۦۖ فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُ ٱلرَّسُولُ قَالَ ٱرۡجِعۡ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَسۡـَٔلۡهُ مَا بَالُ ٱلنِّسۡوَةِ ٱلَّٰتِي قَطَّعۡنَ أَيۡدِيَهُنَّۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي بِكَيۡدِهِنَّ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqāla al-maliku i'tūnī bihi falammā jāahu al-rasūlu qāla ir'jiʿ ilā rabbika fasalhu mā bālu al-nis'wati allātī qaṭṭaʿna aydiyahunna inna rabbī bikaydihinna ʿalīmun
